info.author: Nikos Koukis
info.description:
**Pump3000** is a GUI implementation for communicating with the Cavro XP3000 pump series. It was implemented in Python with the use of PySide.

The Software was designed and implemented as an individual project of mine for the Systems Biology & Bioengineering Research Laboratory of the Mech. Engineering Department of the National Technical university of Athens
info.keywords: medical, pump, GUI, PySide, python2, bioengineering, bioinformatics, research project,

info.name: Pump3000
info.summary: Pump3000: A Graphical User Interface for controlling Cavro XP3000 pumps
info.html_description:
Pump3000 is a GUI implementation for communicating with the Cavro XP3000 pump series. It was implemented in Python with the use of PySide.

The Software was designed and implemented as an individual project of mine for the Systems Biology & Bioengineering Research Laboratory of the Mech. Engineering Department of the National Technical university of Athens
